articles.content: Sunderland have sold out their away allocation for the second-leg of the League One play-off semi-final at Hillsborough. The Black Cats were given 2,000 for the match against Sheffield Wednesday, the… [+1229 chars]

articles.title: How Championship final-day drama will play out on Sky Sports, with Middlesbrough not shown live - Teesside Live
articles.description: Middlesbrough travel to Preston North End with a place in the play-offs to play for
articles.content: Middlesbrough's must-win game at Preston North End won't be shown live on Sky Sports on Saturday, with the broadcaster instead choosing Luton Town vs Reading as its live game. But in what promises to… [+2823 chars]

articles.title: 'Ashamed' Ronnie O'Sullivan was stripped of title in 1998 after positive cannabis test - Express
articles.description: RONNIE O'SULLIVAN defeated Judd Trump in the Snooker World Championship final on Monday.
